update t_lsc_saleorder
c_uuid = #{cUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_cid = #{cCid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_clerk = #{cClerk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_check = #{cCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dt_check = #{dtCheck,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
c_checkout = #{cCheckout,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dt_checkout = #{dtCheckout,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

c_comment = #{cComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_bono = #{iBono,jdbcType=INTEGER},
i_status = #{iStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where i_no = #{iNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} and dt_dt = #{dtDt,jdbcType=DATE}

update t_lsc_saleorder set c_uuid = #{cUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_cid = #{cCid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_clerk = #{cClerk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_check = #{cCheck,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dt_check = #{dtCheck,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_checkout = #{cCheckout,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dt_checkout = #{dtCheckout,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_invalid = #{cInvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dt_invalid = #{dtInvalid,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, c_comment = #{cComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, i_bono = #{iBono,jdbcType=INTEGER}, i_status = #{iStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where i_no = #{iNo,jdbcType=BIGINT} and dt_dt = #{dtDt,jdbcType=DATE}
